name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder-2
description: A 2-item ultra-brief anxiety screening tool consisting of the first two items of the GAD-7. Highly sensitive for detecting generalized anxiety, panic, social anxiety, and PTSD.
reference: Kroenke, K., Spitzer, R. L., Williams, J. B., Monahan, P. O., & LÃ¶we, B. (2007). Anxiety disorders in primary care: Prevalence, impairment, comorbidity, and detection. Annals of Internal Medicine, 146(5), 317-325.
instructions: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?

questions.name: gad2_1
questions.description: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge

questions.name: gad2_2
questions.description: Not being able to stop or control worrying
